short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick and easy image cropping directly from your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cut Image is a lightweight extension that makes image cropping simple and fast.

Key Features:
• Select and crop any image from web pages
• Right-click access through context menu
• Set precise dimensions in pixels
• Copy to clipboard or save as file
• Clean, minimalist interface

How to use:
1. Right-click on any image
2. Select "Cut Image" from the context menu
3. Draw selection area or input exact dimensions
4. Copy or save the cropped image

Perfect for:
• Social media content
• Design work
• Quick image edits
• Saving specific parts of images

No ads, no unnecessary features - just simple and efficient image cropping.
